```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# source R script
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
```

```{r}
# estimate stormwater volume
imp_fractions <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

runoff_volumes <- predict_runoff(imp_fractions, 182)

# bind results into a data frame
runoff_volumes_df <- data.frame(runoff_volumes)
```

```{r}
# create graph
runoff_graph <- ggplot(data = runoff_volumes_df, aes(x = runoff_volumes, y = imp_fractions)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()

runoff_graph

ggsave(here::here("figs", "runoff_graph.png"), height = 5, width = 6)
```
